title: How to unsubscribe from Apple TV+
description: Here's how to cancel your Apple TV+ subscription on different devices.

steps_1.title: Cancel Apple TV+ Subscription on iOS
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Apple TV+ subscription on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch, follow these steps:

*   Open the Settings app.
*   Tap your name.
*   Tap Subscriptions.
*   Tap Apple TV+.
*   Tap Cancel Subscription. You might need to scroll down.
*   Confirm the cancellation.

seo_text: Cancel Apple TV+ subscription, unsubscribe from Apple TV+, manage Apple subscriptions, Apple TV+ cancellation guide.
